Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of a pale-red pottery vessel, interior very worn, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text identifying contents.
Curator's comments: Peet & Woolley, City of Akhenaten I. Pl. LXIV fig. 16
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393180) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393180)
